import { Record, Number, String, Static } from 'runtypes';


import { hex, InRoomParams } from '@/shared/types';


export const tag = Record({

	id: Number,

	roomId: Number,

	name: String,

	mainColor: hex,

	secondColor: hex,

});


export interface Tag extends Static<typeof tag> <BODY Tag>

export interface GetTagParams extends InRoomParams <BODY GetTagParams>

export interface CreateTagParams extends Omit<Tag, 'id'> <BODY CreateTagParams>

export interface UpdateTagParams

	extends Partial<Omit<CreateTagParams, 'roomId'>>,

		InRoomParams <BODY UpdateTagParams
>

export interface RemoveTagParams extends InRoomParams <BODY RemoveTagParams>
